text: The 1961 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship was the first staging of the All-Ireland hurling championship. The championship ended on 17 September 1961. Wexford won the title after defeating London by 3-15 to 4-4 in the final. ==Results== ===Leinster Intermediate Hurling Championship=== ===Munster Intermediate Hurling Championship=== ===All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship=== ==References== Intermediate Category:All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championships
title: 1961 All-Ireland Intermediate Hurling Championship
